Detailed Description

bool LESENSE_CoreCtrlDesc_TypeDef::bufOverWr

Set to true in order to always make LESENSE write to the result buffer, even if it is full.

bool LESENSE_CoreCtrlDesc_TypeDef::storeScanRes
